title: Sony and Nintendo Face Chillier Postpandemic World
sub_head: Japanese gaming giants expect slowing profit growth just as Microsoft, other rivals plow cash into games
body:
Like many consumer-technology companies, Sony and Nintendo were beneficiaries of the pandemic. They now face a more treacherous environment.
While both companies had some good news to accompany their earnings announcements, they also flagged slower profit growth aheadâ€”and each is facing headwinds from deep-pocketed rivals, aging consoles, or both.
